creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red on black; thick; top half embroidered with floral designs; wide bands surround center square; bottom half appliqued with bird, tree, butterflies, outlined with red and green; 1-3/4" band; some metal outlines applique; denim lining
title: Baby Carrier
